sentences.sContent: A cup of rice which cost thirty cents a few weeks ago is now being sold for up to one dollar.
sentences.sCn: 几周前价值30美分的1杯米如今卖到了1美元。

synos.tran: 分；一分的硬币；森特（等于半音程的百分之一）

words.tran: 集中，使聚集在一点；定中心

trans.tranOther: 1/100th of the standard unit of money in some countries. For example, there are 100 cents in one dollar or in one  euro  : symbol ¢.
